name: nyks
keywords: Let's have a beer and talk in Paris

scripts.eslint: eslint test array async buffer child_process collection color crypto date fs function http lang math object os path process promise require stream string
scripts.cover: nyc --temp-directory coverage/.nyc_output --reporter text-summary --reporter html --reporter lcov  mocha
scripts.test: npm run cover  test test/async && npm run eslint

readme:
# nyks toolkit

Extend nodejs & javascript native API of missing functions.
